sections.heading: Annual report of board9-922.Annual report of boardThe board shall submit a written report to the governing body on the first Monday in January of each year, showing in detail the condition of the fund and transactions of the board during the preceding year
sections.text: Annual report of board9-922.Annual report of boardThe board shall submit a written report to the governing body on the first Monday in January of each year, showing in detail the condition of the fund and transactions of the board during the preceding year.
